item.title: Custom Resource Definition
item.description: Custom Resource Definition Introduction In this Chapter, we will review the Custom Resource Definition (CRD) concept, and some examples of usage. In Kubernetes API, a resource is an endpoint storing the API objects in a collection. As an example, the pods resource contains a collection of Pod objects. CRDâ€™s are extensions of Kubernetes API that stores collection of API objects of certain kind. They extend the Kubernetes API or allow you to add your own API into the cluster.
